Package nl.thedutchruben.mccore.spigot.ui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
nl.thedutchruben.mccore.spigot.ui.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder
public class GUI extends Object implements org.bukkit.inventory.InventoryHolder
GUI class for creating custom inventories

This class provides a base for creating custom GUIs in Minecraft

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GUI(int rows, String title)
    Creates a new GUI with a specified number of rows (1-6) and a title
